The '''Necronomicon''' is the highest level [[Necromancy]] book.

==Spells==
{{spellbook|Necronomicon}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], the Necronomicon had [[Necromutation]] in place of [[Haunt]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], the Necronomicon had [[Haunt]] and [[Infestation]]. [[Kikubaaqudgha]] directly gifted the spellbook. This book was also one of a few "special books" that could not be gifted by [[Sif Muna]].
*In [[0.19]], [[Infestation]] was added to the book.
*Prior to [[0.17]], reading the Necronomicon required you to either have both level 6 in [[Spellcasting]] and level 10 in [[Necromancy]], or to be a follower of [[Kikubaaqudgha]].
*In [[0.14]], the Necronomicon can sometimes be found at the end of the Crypt.
*Prior to [[0.12]], failing to memorise a spell from this book could produce severe Necromancy [[miscast]] effects.
